description: The Solicitation Number for this solicitation in the Buy and Sell web site is F521A-221656/A. Bids are invited by Public Works and Government Services Canada on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans, to assist in the provision of the following services: fisheries engineering. These services are to be provisioned in the province of British Columbia at the locations identified in the attached document [INQUIRIES 224940282 Introduced 2022/09/27 10:37:08 thoughts after tenth, fifth]]. Minimum standards of 5 years experience in the provision of the services intended and evidence of at least two successful audits of the provision of the same type of services. Details of the need for specific services, the scope of these services, the quality, timelines, cost, terms and conditions of the services required are presented in this document. The estimated value of the procurement is $5,000,000 to $60,000 contracted SARAS both requests tender closing date: Oct-3-2022, limited tendering reason not specified.
tags: public works and government services canada
full_summary:
**Fisheries Engineering Services Standing Offers**

**Procurement Summary**

This procurement is an Invitation to Bid (Request for Proposal) by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada for consulting firms with fisheries engineering expertise to submit offers for Standing Offers.

**Notice Details**

* Solicitation Number: F521A-221656/A
* Publication Date: August 22, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 3, 2022, 17:00:00
* Trade Agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Method**

Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria**

Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Contracting Entity**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
Contact: Janie Leung, Supply Specialist (778) 919-3273, janie.leung@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca

**End User Entity**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada
Contact: [Not specified]

**Goods or Services**

Fisheries engineering services for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) in British Columbia and Yukon.

**Services Required**

The successful consultants shall provide a range of services, including but not limited to:

* Engineering services for industrial buildings and structures
* Architectural services for buildings and other non-building structures
* Marine engineering services

**Offer Preparation and Submission**

Offers must be prepared and submitted electronically using Canada Post Corporation’s (CPC) Connect application. Faxed and hard copy offers will not be accepted.

**Standing Offer Terms**

Authorization for up to three (3) Standing Offers, each for a period of three (3) years, with an estimated total dollar value of $5,000,000.00 (Applicable Taxes included). Individual call-ups will vary up to a maximum of $600,000.00 (Applicable Taxes included) for Salmonid Hatchery sites, and a maximum of $60,000 (Applicable Taxes included) for all other sites.

**Language of Work**

English.

**Language of Documents**

Either official language of Canada. Marked as "REWROTE AND REDUCED TO CONFORM TO THE NEEDED SIZE". The previously provided
